channel.title: Geting Ctrl C to work in SCAR
channel.description:
Hi all,
Iâ€™m trying to use the TypeSend procedure in SRL to copy and paste text into a search function. Does anyone have any ideas on what the key integer is for Ctrl or any suggestions for another approach?
Any input gratefully received :)
Thanks in advance
Fink
:| Edit: NP Galook has already answered my question ;)
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,4167.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,4167.0.html[/url]
I guess its just too late for my brain to function properly :rolleyes:
Thanks Galook :)
